file_operations.description: Add baseline SEO metadata in the HTML head: default meta description, Open Graph tags (title/description/image), and link tags for favicon; keep document language as English.

Create a small SEO helper component to set per-route document.title and update/insert meta description and Open Graph tags on navigation (client-side), ensuring each page has unique title/description.

Use the SEO helper to set Home-specific title/description and include the phrase ‚ÄúRestaurant near GIFT City Gandhinagar‚Äù naturally in visible content (e.g., hero subtext or intro section); ensure hero image uses appropriate attributes (width/height, loading/decoding) to reduce CLS.
